articles.description: CHRISTMAS can't soon enough after the trials and tribulations of 2020 with people already turning to their televisions for some heartwarming festive fare or thrilling entertainment. Here's what to watch on Netflix this Christmas.

articles.author: Capital
articles.title: Is Gigi Hadid Pregnant Again? - Capital
articles.description: Is Gigi Hadid pregnant again with Zayn Malik’s baby? The supermodel has caused some confusion by sharing a string of stunning photographs of her bump on Instagram.
articles.content:
1 December 2020, 11:03
Gigi Hadid shared a photograph of her bump and now fans think she's pregnant again with Zayn Malik's baby.
Picture: 
Gigi Hadid/Instagram
